description: Are you an intermediate Python programmer who becomes frustrated by copy and pasting or duplicating code? Luckily, the Python programming language provides us with a unique set of tools to make our code more elegant, readable, and reduce duplication. In this talk, I’ll share common anti-patterns in python programs and show you practical pythonic solutions for supercharging your code with tools like Decorators, Context Managers, Mixins, and Lambdas.
title: Elegant Solutions for Everyday Python Problems
